content: can t get enough of cables this pattern is worked in offset cables for more give while ribbing ensures a snug fit without sacrificing warmth pattern can be modified for use with yarns of different weights just increase or decrease cast on in multiples of 24 stitches used k p k2tog p2tog update 12/07/2018 apologies for not gettting to this sooner teaching full time doesn t leave much time for much else row 7 to 11 of the crown shaping section have been misnumbered in the pattern they should be numbered as row 6-10 in other words continue the pattern as written row 6 is *not* missing i m just really bad at spotting typos sorry about that update 13/4/2020 finally managed to correct the typo in the crown shaping section having access to acrobat double_crochet sure makes editing pdfs a lot easier thanks for all the input everyone
